channel.title: Leadership on Matthew do Santos-Zounon
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Matthew do Santos-Zounon

item.title: SFU Robotics: Autonomous Robot Soccer
item.description:
Role: Software Team Lead
Location: Burnaby, BC
Team: SFU Autonomous Robot Soccer Club

Overview

Led the software team responsible for autonomous robot behavior and coordination, while working closely with electrical, firmware, and mechanical teams to deliver robots for RoboCup.

What I shipped

  • Directed design and development of autonomous robot software in C++ using Qt6 and Protobuf.
  • Ran weekly software meetings and coordinated across sub-teams in admin syncs.
  • Led recruitment by reviewing applications, conducting interviews, and onboarding new members.
  • Collaborated with hardware teams to integrate systems and meet competition deadlines.

Impact

  • Established repeatable team processes that improved delivery cadence.
  • Strengthened cross-team alignment to ship competition-ready robots.

Stack

C++17/20, Qt6, Protobuf
